So yes, it seems the pattern is that when there's a comma, it represents a decimal point, like 101.3 meters.

Aqua Maria length = 101.3 meters

Now, calculate the difference: Aqua Maria - Aqua Spirit = 101.3 - 75 = 26.3 meters.

The claim is that Aqua Spirit is 26.3 meters smaller than Aqua Maria, which matches exactly with our calculation.
